name: Rhythm Marker - Forró Edition
description:
This is a preliminary version of the game, it only contains the main rhythm mechanics.

The project was sent to an evaluation of classes I took at the university, and I want to continue this work.

Now I'm working on the story  of this game.

When the story is done, I'll be implementing new mechanics live on twitch.

Forgive the grammar mistakes, english is not my native language.
